title: Smart Data Models - GovSteam0
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A simplified steam turbine governor model.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteam0

dt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine damping coefficient (Dt).  Unit = delta P / delta speed. Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase)  (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

r.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent droop (R).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Steam bowl time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Numerator time constant of T2/T3 block (T2).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Reheater time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

vmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve position, PU of mwcap (Vmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

vmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum valve position, PU of mwcap (Vmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0
